title: Confetti of the Mind - the Short Films of Nacho Vigalondo
description: Alamo Drafthouse's favorite son and the unofficial mascot for Fantastic Fest, Nacho Vigalondo blew the indie world away in 2008 with his astonishing debut feature TIMECRIMES before following up with EXTRATERRESTRIAL (2011) and OPEN WINDOWS (2014). But the startling originality in these films didn't come from nowhere; Nacho had already written, directed, produced and acted in a robust body of short films, including 2003's Academy Award®-nominated short film, 7:35 IN THE MORNING.
synopsis: Fantastic Fest hero and mascot Nacho Vigalondo returns to present the definitive collection of his short films.
